title: LangChain
description: Building applications with LLMs through composability.

dependencies.name: LangChain
dependencies.description: This will install the bare minimum requirements of LangChain. A lot of the value of LangChain comes when integrating it with various model providers, datastores, etc.

dependencies.name: LangChain Core
dependencies.description: Base abstractions that the rest of the LangChain ecosystem uses, along with the LangChain Expression Language. It is automatically installed by langchain, but can also be used separately.

dependencies.name: LangChain CLI
dependencies.description: CLI for working with LangChain templates and other LangServe projects.

dependencies.name: LangChain Community
dependencies.description: Third-party integrations. It is automatically installed by langchain, but can also be used separately.

dependencies.name: LangChain Experimental
dependencies.description: experimental LangChain code, intended for research and experimental uses.

dependencies.name: LangChain OpenAI
dependencies.description: LangChain integrations for OpenAI through their openai SDK.

dependencies.name: LangGraph
dependencies.description: Building language agents as graphs. Library for building stateful, multi-actor applications with LLMs, built on top of (and intended to be used with) LangChain.

dependencies.name: LangServe
dependencies.description: Building language agents as graphs. Library for building stateful, multi-actor applications with LLMs, built on top of (and intended to be used with) LangChain.
